items.text: Design & develop appealing websites of various functionalities using a mixture of CSS, SASS, HTML, PHP & Javascript with a focus on UI & UX
Facilitating relationships with clients and account managers to define and scope out project objectives to achieve clients' goals
Manage and develop a range of projects through all stages of the development lifecycle
Provide clients with training on use of CMS, third party services, online strategy and best practices
Edit various media using Adobe Creative Suite and other tools to be ready for website or marketing campaigns and content
Create and maintain collaborative relationships with our clients, freelancers, graphic designers, back-end developers and marketers.
Manage numerous clients & projects simultaneously under tight timelines
Completion of over 50 web projects in under 2 years
Developed meaningful relationships with colleagues and clients
Manage our online presence, including social media, an Ecommerce website and multiple ebay stores
Stock management and product placement for our retail store
Primary contact for our customers and select suppliers
Automated processes to reduce data entry time by over 90%
Design & Implement a flight simulator installation
Managed an outsourced website development team through redevelopment of our website
Managed social media accounts, increasing reach by over 250% with no increase in budget
